ygData.subject: Re: More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... if there ... become a ... a Guild. ... is, a ... anyone on ... Guilds don t always take a lot of time.  Look for a guild of casual players.  They don t
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Dawn" <dlb@p...> wrote:
> I love Chivalry! I might have to try a mail character just to see
if there
> is a difference in my perspective. As far as Guild's..... I've not
become a
> member of one yet. I don't really have the time it takes to be in
a Guild.
> Wouldn't want to be a leader either. I enjoy the game for what it
is, a
> game and I'm having fun meeting new people.
>
> I'll be playing Allilee and Maralexis tonight about 7 pm PDT if
anyone on
> Tarew wants to say hello. Got to work on the little ones!
>
> Kanalyn 16 Druid
> Analyn 9 Beastlord
> Allilee 6 Ranger
> Maralexis 6 Wizard

Guilds don't always take a lot of time. Look for a guild of casual
players. They don't raid as much, but you're not ready for that
anyway!

And be sure to take advantage of the newbie changes. I got a new guy
to 10th last night because of the shortened down time not having to
seach for my corpse!

Tuldayen Grimblade
35th season Ranger of Tunare
Torhelm
10th season Paladin of Brell
>
> Tarew Marr
